howToStart.title: How to Get Started?
howToStart.description: Here are the essential steps to start creating an online store on the Merchants site effectively and easily

1.title: Create Your Store
1.desc: Register. Choose a template. Build from scratch. Customize the design, colors, and fonts. User-friendly interface for your amazing online store. Start now!
1.details: Register. Choose a template. Build from scratch. Customize the design, colors, and fonts. User-friendly interface for your amazing online store. Start now!

2.title: Display Your Products
2.desc: Add images, descriptions, and prices for your products or services.
2.details: Bring your products to life easily. Upload, describe, and price them. Organize them for easy browsing. Make an unforgettable impact with irresistible offers.

3.title: Configure Shopping Experience
3.desc: Customize store design, payment methods, and shipping options.
3.details: Customize the complete shopping experience for your customers. Add multiple payment methods and appropriate shipping options. Design the shopping cart and checkout pages in a smooth and secure way.

4.title: Secure Transactions & Happy Customers
4.desc: Start selling and receive payments securely.
4.details: Enjoy watching your store grow. Track sales and inventory through an easy dashboard. Provide a secure experience for your customers with an encrypted and trusted payment system.

howToStart.trialNote: No credit card required â€¢ 14-day free trial â€¢ Cancel anytime

features.title: Why Bokinn?
features.subtitle: Complete Hotel Management System
features.description: A professional platform for managing hotel bookings, optimizing occupancy, and providing an exceptional guest experience

booking.title: Booking Management
booking.desc: Advanced booking system with an intuitive calendar that provides a comprehensive view of occupancy and easy booking modifications.

payment.title: Integrated Payment Gateway
payment.desc: Support for multiple electronic payment methods with complete transaction security and instant booking confirmation.

guest.title: Guest Management
guest.desc: Comprehensive guest database that stores preferences and stay history to provide personalized service on each visit.

reports.title: Reports and Analytics
reports.desc: Smart dashboard with detailed reports on occupancy, revenue, and key performance indicators for informed decision-making.

direct.title: Direct Bookings
direct.desc: Integrated booking website that allows guests to book directly without intermediaries, with full mobile compatibility.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.desc: Specialized support team ready to assist you at any time to ensure uninterrupted operations and quick problem resolution.

paymentMethods.title: Integrated Payment Methods and Booking Options
paymentMethods.description: All payment methods you need for your hotel booking platform, with flexible reservation options for guests

preBooking.title: Pre-booking
preBooking.desc: Book your room in advance with instant booking confirmation

payAtArrival.title: Pay at Arrival
payAtArrival.desc: Book now and pay later when you arrive at the hotel

advanceDiscount.title: Advance Discount
advanceDiscount.desc: Get a special discount when paying in full in advance

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.description: Learn about the experiences of hotels partnered with us and how we've helped them improve their booking management
